net.majorkernelpanic.streaming

Class SessionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.SessionBuilder

  • public class SessionBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Call getInstance() to get access to the SessionBuilder.

      • setContext

        public SessionBuilder setContext(android.content.Context context)
        Access to the context is needed for the H264Stream class to store some stuff in the SharedPreferences. Note that you should pass the Application context, not the context of an Activity.
